summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.3°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 7410 lux) and cloud levels (up 306 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12889 lux), cloud levels (up 1886 m), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 305.6m lower than yesterday, 799.7m lower than the past week, 1885.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 761.4m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1561.1m and 2650m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and winds will be practically absent. Periods of rain anticipated, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
